generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible tram tracks and lane markings, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and pedestrian areas.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible, including one sitting on a bench, another standing near a bus stop, and others walking on the sidewalk.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the right side of the road, and one car is driving ahead in the center of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "No Parking" sign and a "No Stopping" sign on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and overhead wires.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the image, near the bus stop area.
